thread.title: India Love Celebrates 21 By Posing Completely Naked On Instagram [NSFW]
thread.title_full: India Love Celebrates 21 By Posing Completely Naked On Instagram [NSFW]

author: Trent Clark
title: India Love Celebrates 21 By Posing Completely Naked On Instagram [NSFW]
text:
A photo posted by illy (@indialove) on Feb 3, 2017 at 10:56am PST 3 
Los Angeles, CA – India Love has never dropped a mixtape in her life, but her status within Hip Hop is more valued than most struggle rappers. Aside from her good looks and her family BET reality show The Westbrooks, being associated with the likes of Drake , The Game , Lil Yachty and Soulja Boy has kept her name atop social media trending pools, for better or worse . 
Today (February 3) marks the official day the reality star can legally consume alcohol as she turns 21 and she decided to give her millions of social media fans an actual taste of her birthday: by posing in her birthday suit. 
“How I came into this world: It wasn’t easy embracing big ass boobs at a young age while everyone around me wasn’t even developed yet,” she wrote on the first picture of a nude photo shoot that clearly evokes the “Free The Nipple” movement. “Ive always been so hard on myself for not having hips, or enough ass just because of the picture this generation paints of us Women. I’m now so proud to say that everything I’m not, Made me everything I am. I love me, with all of me. Being a Bold Confident Woman speaks Volumes in my life & it keeps my crown on straight & tight. #sorrynotsorry if this posts offends you. I can only be ME. forever.” 
Check out the India Love birthday shoot down — Forever 21 Edition — down below. Just in case Instagram throws a Super Bowl-sized flag on the play, we decided to hit you with the screencaps. 

Oh and Rick Ross approves.
